lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace began life under Sam Allardyce with a 1-1 draw at Watford on Monday though they could easily have won an evenly-balanced Premier League game but for a missed Christian Benteke penalty.

headline.print_headline: Palace Draw at Watford in First Game Under Allardyce
headline.main: Palace Draw at Watford in First Game Under Allardyce

snippet: Crystal Palace began life under Sam Allardyce with a 1-1 draw at Watford on Monday though they could easily have won an evenly-balanced Premier League game but for a missed Christian Benteke penalty....
